item.title: Bitcoin briefly drops below $115,000
item.description: On August 18th, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin briefly fell below $115,000 and is now trading at $115,077, with a 24-hour decrease of 2.49%.

item.title: Binance: RiceAI (RICE) TGE participation threshold is 230 Alpha Points
item.description: August 18, as per an official announcement, Binance has declared that Binance users possessing 230 points or more of Binance Alpha Points are eligible to participate in the RiceAI (RICE) TGE event via the Alpha event page. Participating in this event will result in a deduction of 15 points.

item.title: 「Brother Big Shot」 Contrarian Increases Position, Floating Loss Expands to $8.8 Million
item.description: On August 18th, according to on-chain data, the cryptocurrency market maintained its downward trend. "Big Brother Whale" Huang Lizheng continued to accumulate in the face of the market, and the unrealized losses of his long positions have expanded to $8.8 million.Currently, his long positions consist of: 23,400 ETH long, 180 BTC long, 115,000 HYPE long, and 250 million PUMP long. Among them, the Ethereum long position alone has an unrealized loss of nearly $8.2 million.

item.title: 「$125,000 Long ETH Liquidation」 Whale Continues to Reduce Position, ETH Longs Drop to 66,000 Coins
item.description: On August 18th, according to WhaleMap, a "Whale Longing $125k ETH" whale has trimmed their position by 10,745 ETH in the past half an hour. The long position in ETH has decreased from 76,700 ETH to 66,000 ETH, and the current total unrealized gains have shrunk to $8.58 million.

item.title: A whale unloaded 5000 ETH from a long position to avoid liquidation, reducing unrealized gains to $2.95 million.
item.description: On August 18th, as monitored by EmberCN, a whale reduced its long position by 5000 ETH in order to avoid liquidation. Currently, it holds a long position of 20,000 ETH with a leverage of 25 times. The entry price was $4,148, the liquidation price is $4,220, and the overall unrealized profit has been narrowed down to $2.95 million.

item.title: Publicly traded company BTC AB will raise up to approximately $21.9 million in funding to purchase more Bitcoin.
item.description: On August 18th, according to NLNico, the Swedish listed company B Treasury Capital AB (BTC AB) is going to raise up to 209 million Swedish Krona (approximately 21.9 million USD) in order to purchase a greater amount of Bitcoin because its previously issued warrants have been exercised.

item.title: Publicly traded company Capital B has raised $2.6 million to purchase more Bitcoin
item.description: On August 18th, according to NLNico, the publicly traded French company Capital B has managed to raise 2.2 million euros (equivalent to 2.6 million US dollars). The full subscription came from Blockstream CEO Adam Back, with the intention of purchasing a greater amount of Bitcoin.

item.title: Orama Labs Launches PYTHIA-based LaunchPad and Forms Strategic Partnership with Kingnet Capital HK
item.description: August 18th. According to an official statement, Orama Labs is set to launch a LaunchPad based on PYTHIA and has entered into a strategic partnership with Kingnet Capital HK. Orama Labs is dedicated to constructing the next-generation asset tokenization protocol, with the aim of addressing the inefficiencies in traditional research funding and resource allocation. Meanwhile, Kingnet Capital HK will offer core AI technical support to Orama Labs.The platform intends to finance the development of scientific experiments, safeguard intellectual property rights, overcome information silos and community governance issues, establish a closed-loop ecosystem from research to commercial application, and stimulate the innovative development of on-chain research.PYTHIA, as the core governance token of the platform, is utilized to motivate research contributors, fund high-quality research projects, and drive on-chain governance. Orama Labs' first product, LaunchPad, is on the verge of being rele

item.title: Aergo is rebranding to HPP, and the token will undergo a 1:1 swap.
item.description: August 18th. Aergo made an announcement in a post stating that the House Party Protocol Mainnet has officially gone live. It is an evolution of Aergo. This AI-native network integrates more than a decade of enterprise-grade blockchain expertise with AI-native Layer 2 infrastructure. It is designed for the AI era to support real-time autonomous agents, verifiable off-chain reasoning, and a thriving multi-chain economy.The official will exchange users' AERGO tokens for HPP (HPP Mainnet ERC-20) at a 1:1 ratio or swap AQT tokens for HPP at a ratio of 1 AQT = 7.43026 HPP. HPP aims to be listed on all current exchanges that support AERGO.

item.title: A Whale Liquidated Long Positions of over 21,000 ETH, Losing $6.6 Million and Exiting
item.description: On August 18th, as per the monitoring of lookonchain, the whale address 0x89Da liquidated its long position of 21,683 ETH (valued at $93.5 million), incurring a loss of $6.6 million. Subsequently, it withdrew all 9.6 million USDC from Hyperliquid, thereby effectively exiting this "casino."
